channel.title: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp
channel.description:
Well first of all , [b]I take no responsibility if you Brick Your psp[/b] Which probably won't happen if you follow the instructions correctly. [url=http://www.psp-hacks.com/forums/viewtopic.php?id=72067]What is a brick?[/url]
[b]1.[/b] Okay well first of all You need to find out what version your firmware is on your psp you can do this by going settings , system settings and clicking on system information.
[b]2.[/b] Select Your PSP Firmware Version Below, Which You Need To Downgrade. [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.81downgrader.html][b]2.81[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.80downgrader.html][b]2.80[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.71downgrader.html][b]2.71[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.70downgrader.html][b]2.70[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.60downgrader.html][b]2.60[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.50downgrader.html][b]2.50[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.01downgrader.html][b]2.01[/b][/url] [url=http://homepage.eircom.net/~pspcalo/2.00downgrader.html][b]2.00[/b][/url]
[b]3.[/b] Read the [b]ReadMe[/b] File inside the file you have just downloaded and follow the instructions.
[b]4.[/b] After downgrading successfully you should have gotten a screen like this [img]http://binarybonsai.com/images/pspbsod.jpg[/img] Don't worry this is a good thing this means that you have succesfully downgraded to 1.5 firmware push o and configure your psp Go to System Information and it should say Firmware: 1.50
[b]5.[/b] Download [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/27057228/3.40oe-A_Installation_Noob_Proof_1.5.zip]this[/url] to upgrade to 3.40 OE-A Follow the instructions in the read me file.
[b]6.[/b] You should have gotten the same screen you have gotten before , Reconfigure your psp for the last time , You have succesfully gotten 3.40 OE-A firmware , you can now play Games directly off your memory stick Just simply Download games from [url=http://www.pspiso.com/index.php?board=6.0]Here[/url](You May Need To Register) and Drag them into the iso file which should be in the root of your memory stick (if there isn't just create one) , [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/5275/isoay2.png[/img][/URL]
[b]7.[/b] Exit go to games and click on memory stick and click on the game , The game should boot up

item.title: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Well it depends where you live. But if you really want to be sure that you can downgrade you could buy it from ebay, but stores should have under 2.81.

EDIT: oh yeah and if you get from 2.81 to 3.03 you have to get a gta:lcs unpatched version (2.00 update on the umd)

Read full topic
item.source: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp

item.title: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

3.40 oe-a isnt very stable. Put a link for 3.30 oe-a or 3.10 oe-a’ otherwise looks good when I red it fast. I was going to do this today, but you did it before me. I could add stuff to your guide or make a own.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp

item.title: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp
item.dc:creator: @K0rupt.net K0rupt.net
item.description:
@K0rupt.net wrote:

Well first of all , I take no responsibility if you Brick Your psp Which probably won’t happen if you follow the instructions correctly.
What is a brick?

1. Okay well first of all You need to find out what version your firmware is on your psp you can do this by going settings , system settings and clicking on system information.

2. Select Your PSP Firmware Version Below, Which You Need To Downgrade.
2.81 2.80 2.71 2.70
2.60 2.50 2.01 2.00

3. Read the ReadMe File inside the file you have just downloaded and follow the instructions.

4. After downgrading successfully you should have gotten a screen like this

Don’t worry this is a good thing this means that you have succesfully downgraded to 1.5 firmware push o and configure your psp Go to System Information and it should say Firmware: 1.50

5. Download this to upgrade to 3.40 OE-A
Follow the instructions in the read me file.

6. You should have gotten the same screen you have gotten before , Reconfigure your psp for the last time ,
You have succesfully gotten 3.40 OE-A firmware , you can now play Games directly off your memory stick Just simply Download games from Here(You May Need To Register) and Drag them into the iso file which should be in the root of your memory stick (if there isn’t just create one) ,

7. Exit go to games and click on memory stick and click on the game , The game should boot up

Read full topic
item.source: How to Play Downloaded games on your psp
